SEARCH
Package controller.report

Class ReportManager

Object
ReportManager
public class ReportManager extends Object
This class manages the generation and filtering of reports for camps. Handles various types of reports like attendee lists, performance reports, and enquiry reports. Provides methods to generate, filter, and view reports.
Since:
25/11/23
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

  • Method Details

    • promptWhichCampForStaff

      public static Camp promptWhichCampForStaff()
      Prompts the staff user to choose a camp for report generation. Allows selection from camps created by the logged-in staff member.
      Returns:
      camp - the chosen camp for report generation.

    • promptCampReportType

      public static int promptCampReportType()
      Prompts the staff user to choose the type of report to generate.
      Returns:
      The integer representing the chosen report type.

    • promptForCampReportFilter

      public static int promptForCampReportFilter()
      Prompts the user for the filter type for camp reports.
      Returns:
      integer - the integer representing the chosen filter type. 0 - alphabetical order 1 - camp name 2 - location 3 - after a certain date 4 - student

    • promptForPerformanceReportFilter

      public static int promptForPerformanceReportFilter()
      Prompts the user for the filter type for performance reports.
      Returns:
      The integer representing the chosen filter type. 0 - select from camp list 1 - filter by camp name or 2 - filter by student)

    • getFilteredReportContent

      public static String getFilteredReportContent(String reportType, ArrayList<Camp> listOfCamps)
      Generates filtered report content based on the report type and list of camps.
      Parameters:
      reportType - - The type of report to generate ("studentlist", "performance", "enquiry").
      listOfCamps - - The list of camps to filter and generate the report from.
      Returns:
      content - The generated report content as a string.

    • generateCampReportForStaff

      public static void generateCampReportForStaff()
      Generates a camp report for the staff based on various filters or specific camps. filters can be seen above

    • generatePerformanceReportForStaff

      public static void generatePerformanceReportForStaff()
      Generates a performance report for the staff based on various filters or specific camps. filters can be seen above

    • promptForEnquiryReportFilter

      public static int promptForEnquiryReportFilter()
      Prompts the user for the filter type for enquiry reports.
      Returns:
      The integer representing the chosen filter type. 0 - select from camp list 1 - filter by camp name or 2 - filter by replier name

    • generateEnquiryReportForStaff

      public static void generateEnquiryReportForStaff()
      Generates a enquiry report for the staff based on various filters or specific camps. filters can be seen above

      print the content of student list
      Parameters:
      campChosen - - the camp chosen for the student list to be printed
